column1: 2022 Census Industry Code List, Crosswalk, and Summary of Code Changes

column2: Updated 2022 Census Industry Code List based on revisions to the 2022 North American Industry Classification System (NAICS). Equivalent NAICS code shown.
Summary of changes in industry codes between 2017 and 2022 Census Industry Code Lists.
Summary of changes in industry descriptions between the 2017 and 2022 Census Industry Code Lists.

Explanation of changes between the 2017 and 2022 Census Industry Code Lists; indicates whether there was no change, a change to the Census industry code, a change to the Census industry description and/or a change to the NAICS code.
This crosswalk relates the older 2007, 2012, and 2017 Census Industry Code Lists with the 2022 Census Code list and equivalent NAICS codes.

column1: Due to changes between classification years, data users must use caution when making industry comparisons over time since industry codes and descriptions may not be directly comparable. Users can use conversion rates, supplied in other documentation, to convert data with previous classifications systems into the latest system.
